title: nap()
content:
e// utilities.js
export function read(props) { return props.book; }
export function nap(props) { return props.winks; }

// index.js
import { read } from 'utilities';
const eventHandler = (e) => { read({ book: e.target.value }); };
explanation: Only read() is used in index.js, so nap() is considered dead code and excluded from the bundle.

options.text: read()
nap()
